Ominous Wind.description: Has a chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.

Shadow Force.description: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.

Hone Claws.description: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.

Wide Guard.description: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokemon this turn.

Guard Split.description: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

Power Split.description: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

Wonder Room.description: All Pokemon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

Psyshock.description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

Venoshock.description: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

Autotomize.description: Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight.

Rage Powder.description: Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn.

Telekinesis.description: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.

Magic Room.description: Negates held items for five turns.

Smack Down.description: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.

Flame Burst.description: Deals splash damage to Pokemon next to the target.

Sludge Wave.description: Has a chance to poison the target.

Quiver Dance.description: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

Heavy Slam.description: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.

Synchronoise.description: Hits any Pokemon that shares a type with the user.

Electro Ball.description: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.

Soak.description: Changes the target's type to Water.

Flame Charge.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

Coil.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

Low Sweep.description: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Acid Spray.description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

Foul Play.description: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.

Simple Beam.description: Changes the target's ability to Simple.

Entrainment.description: Copies the user's ability onto the target.

After You.description: Makes the target act next this turn.

Round.description: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

Echoed Voice.description: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokemon, to a maximum of 200.

Clear Smog.description: Removes all of the target's stat modifiers.

Stored Power.description: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31 times.

Quick Guard.description: Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokemon this turn.

Ally Switch.description: User switches places with the friendly Pokemon opposite it.

Scald.description: Has a chance to burn the target.

Shell Smash.description: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

Heal Pulse.description: Heals the target for half its max HP.

Hex.description: Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.

Sky Drop.description: Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn.

Shift Gear.description: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.

Circle Throw.description: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokemon.

Quash.description: Makes the target act last this turn.

Acrobatics.description: Has double power if the user has no held item.

Retaliate.description: Has double power if a friendly Pokemon fainted last turn.

Final Gambit.description: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.

Bestow.description: Gives the user's held item to the target.

Inferno.description: Has a chance to burn the target.
